Description.Text: Neva Apartment Hotel is a traditional 4-star superior property offering comfortable accommodation in the heart of St Petersburg. The hotel boasts a fascinating history exhibit and excellent transport links. Located in Chernyshevskaya, the hotel affords quick and easy access to a great variety of restaurants and bars. Nearby places of interest include the Hermitage Museum, the Russian Museum and Nevsky Prospect. Chernyshevskaya metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular St Petersburg destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building with a cream facade. Facilities include a permanent military exhibition. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Superior rooms are more spacious than Standard rooms and have a simple modern decor. Amenities include air-conditioning, a mini-bar and tea and coffee equipment. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower or a walk-in shower. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. A vending machine is available in the lobby. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Chargeable parking is possible onsite.
